calc_helper module¶

calc_helper.np_softmax(x: numpy.ndarray, axis: int = 0) → numpy.ndarray¶

Numpy approach to compute softmax values for each sets of scores in x

Parameters

  • x (np.ndarray) – numpy array to be softmaxed

  • axis (int) – axis where we are applying the softmax

Returns

new numpy array with the softmax values

Return type

np.ndarray
